description: This file defines the interface for the Zigbee Metering Cluster in a Zigbee device driver, including data structures, function prototypes, and conditional compilation based on configuration.

methods.name: meteringClusterCreate
methods.description: Creates and initializes a Zigbee Metering Cluster instance with specified callbacks and context.

methods.name: meteringClusterGetInstantaneousDemand
methods.description: Retrieves the current instantaneous demand for a given device identified by EUI64 and endpoint.

methods.name: meteringClusterGetDivisor
methods.description: Retrieves the divisor value used in metering calculations for a given device.

methods.name: meteringClusterGetMultiplier
methods.description: Retrieves the multiplier value used in metering calculations for a given device.

ctags.name: instantaneousDemandChanged
ctags.typeref: typename:void (*)(uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,int32_t demand,const void * ctx)

fields.name: void (*)(uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,int32_t demand,const void * ctx) instantaneousDemandChanged
